Notice about TRUSTPAD IDO

Dec. 28, 2021 (Corrected Jan. 5,2022)

* Fixed incorrect staking amount and staking period required for $TPAD Levels in TRUSTPAD (2022/1/5)

* Staking period 5 days -> 7 days

* Amount of staking required to reach each Levels (updated table)

Details of the Metaverse (MV) token IDO

TrustPad will be hosting the IDO of our Metaverse (MV) tokens for GensoKishi Online – METAWORLD –.

GensoKishi Online in TRUSTPAD
https://trustpad.io/pool/gensokishi

What is IDO of TRUSTPAD?

In order to participate in the IDO of the various services registered in TRUSTPAD (including GensoKishi Online), you need Levels, which are obtained by staking the token TPAD for 5 days.

The higher your Levels, the higher the allocation multiplier and the more tokens you will be able to purchase when you join the IDO.

If you have Levels, you can submit a purchase request during the IDO entry period described above.

The higher your Levels, the more MV tokens you can purchase.

Also, please note that only BUSD is accepted when purchasing MV tokens.

About the IDO period

・January 18, 2022 12:00 p.m. UTC to January 18, 2022 5:00 p.m. UTC

How to participate in IDO

Step 1.
Go to「IDO Staking」

Step 2.　
Connect the wallet.

Step 3.　
Level

Staking the $TPAD required to obtain Levels.
The amount required for each Levels is shown in the table below.

Step 4.
Register for IDO at GensoKishi Online.
When the IDO registration period opens, go to the pool page and click on the “Register in IDO” button on the IDO pool card of Elemental Knight Online.

$TPAD Levels

※You will need to lock in your $TPAD by staking it for 5 days.
※For Levels below AFFILIATE, you can only participate in IDO if you win the Lottery draw rate when you participate in IDO. Please note.

Other

If you have any questions, please see the TRUSTPAD IDO overview and instructions on how to participate.

Caution

Restricted countries: United States of America,China,Hong Kong, and all sanctioned OFAC countries(DR Congo,Iran,Myanmar,Sudan,Iraq,Ivory Coast,North Korea,Syria,Zimbabwe,Cuba,Balarus,Liberia)

https://trustpad.io/pool/gensokishi
